Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Comitato di redazione - Sociologia del diritto
Editorial Board - Revista Brasileira de Sociologia do Direito

Editorial Board - Oñati Socio-Legal Series ISSN: 2079-5971 - The Oñati Socio-Legal Series is an international peer-reviewed on-line journal which publishes work within the field of law and society. This is broadly defined to include work which makes a significant contribution to the understanding and analysis of law as a set of social institutions, processes, practices or techniques, using any methodologies and approaches from the social sciences and humanities.
